name: Mouse Ultimate
description:
In the adventure of the mouse with his friends to find food with their actions and adventures full of obstacles. 

Immediately in a place full of food they began to act in their adventures but whatever happened they continued to struggle to survive.

It's time for us to act in the game and help them to reach in the adventure for food and find a way out for the next adventure.

Game features:

• In easy-to-play game page screen with touch direction like analog game console.

• Cool animated display dimensions when the game is running to feast the eye.

• Light applications are used when installed on the device.

• A funny sound when the game is running which makes it even more exciting and entertaining.

• Some other guide menus in the game page before starting to play further.

Enjoy the game in spare time while relaxing or with friends.
